name: Arc-en-ciel Peacekeeper
text: If this card is Synchro Summoned: You can add 1 "Dream Prism" from your GY to your hand or equip it to this card, and if you do, add 1 "Arc-en-ciel" monster from your Deck to your hand. Once per turn (Quick Effect): You can send 1 "Dream Prism" you control to the GY and target 1 card on the field; send that card to the GY.
